name: They found oil on the moon!
name_original: They found oil on the moon!
description:
They found oil on the moon! Welcome to my school project, I wonder if you can tell?

Well it's America v Aliens on the moon again... although this time it's the aliens fighting back. Background is my own render btw

Controls:
  • w/s - Forwards and Back (both on legs and in the rover)
  • a/d - Turn   Left and Right   (same)
  • space -   jump (I'd be impressed if you somehow managed to do that in a rover)
  • click -  To shoot (only on the rover)
  • left/right arrow keys -  to turn the rover gun.
  • shift -   Sprint
Known issues:

Way too many but my favourite is only being able to jump in one direction...   maybe the moon's near a black hole?    Of oil!

Credits:

While yes I made it I did need a lot of help form a bunch of places, so all those will be on the github page.
